meanings.definition: On or to a lower floor of a building.
meanings.sent1: She went downstairs to the basement.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was funny to race me downstairs.
meanings.sent4: Her mood spiraled downstairs as the day went on.
meanings.sent5: The idea of going downstairs filled her with dread.

meanings.definition: The lower floor of a building.
meanings.sent1: The downstairs is where the laundry room is located.
meanings.sent2: We heard a noise coming from downstairs.
meanings.sent3: The downstairs seemed to have a mind of its own, creaking at odd times.
meanings.sent4: His heart sank to the downstairs when he realized he had forgotten his keys.
meanings.sent5: The downstairs was a maze of rooms and hallways, easy to get lost in.
